content: i have just finished knitting a cute little hat for a new baby called ethan i liked the simplicity of it so i made a few more in different sizes i hope you will enjoy making it too requires ~ dk yarn between 8g - 16g 4mm needles 5 sizes ~ 6 months 0 - 3 months large preemie medium preemie small preemie perfect for a new baby or a baby doll **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
